parameter_tooltip: Choose the Parameters you would like to see on the map.
map_explanation: Select the KombStRA data to show on the map. To get more information on single fields, just click on the raster cell on the map.
slider_sri_tooltip: Choose the SRI to get number of events >= SRI.
slider_event_rank_tooltip: Choose the rank of the event. E.g. the Top 1 event per grid cell.
slider_opactity_tooltip: Set the opacity of the layer, to see the underlying map.
slider_year_tooltip: Choose the year for which to get the Top event.
popup_explanation: These are the events for this cell that got categorized.
popup_download_tooltip: Download the data for this cell as csv.
popup_error_msg_data: We are sorry, there was a problem fetching the data for this cell.
popup_error_msg_position: We are sorry, there was an error finding the data for this location.")
